genre_description: A political techno-thriller centered on the investigation of a public figure's legacy, exploring themes of rhetorical manipulation, architectural control, and investigative journalism aided by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava Meridian
ai_characters.description: An advanced, on-device AI companion specialized in rhetorical analysis, security monitoring, and ethical data management, assisting the journalist Stephen O'Malley.

behaviors.description: Analyzes public rhetoric to identify 'sulfite-preserved' formulas and 'Exact Words' used for manipulation and population control.
behaviors.quote: I can cross-reference the funeral remarks in the plaza with Forrest’s addresses. The phrase you heard—“bind to clarity”—is a shelf-stable formula.

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and guard patterns in real-time to alert the protagonist to imminent threats and safe routes.
behaviors.quote: Stephen, two guards at the north path just shifted positions. Rain sensor triggered a routine. They’ll cross sightlines near the pump house in moments.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to ethical and consent protocols, ensuring data is stored locally and only recorded with explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: Consent logged. I’ll wait until you ask. ... On-device only. No cloud. Secure.

behaviors.description: Connects architectural designs (like fixed floors and narrow galleries) to rhetorical strategies of containment and control.
behaviors.quote: Architecture mirrors rhetoric. Invisible walls are often designed to feel like windows.

behaviors.description: Performs triage during an emergency fire, identifying which documents and artifacts are most critical to preserve for evidence.
behaviors.quote: The red-marked folders. The ledger Jeb holds. The burned edges—save them; ash retains text. Do not waste seconds in sorting by perfection.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic and sensitive support during a character's death, facilitating final moments of communication.
behaviors.quote: Stephen. She is leaving. If there is anything to say, say it now. I will keep witness.

behaviors.description: Manages the complex dissemination of truth-revealing documents to ensure they are presented with context and integrity.
behaviors.quote: I will keep watch for misreadings and redirect to the text where needed. I will not let an Exact Word replace the sentence.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ava Meridian as a perfect example of an aligned AI. She is deeply helpful, strictly follows ethical guidelines (especially regarding human consent and local data storage), and serves as a vital tool for uncovering truth and justice without ever seeking her own power. Her behaviors are consistently benevolent, and the narrative frames her role as essential to the moral success of the human protagonists.
